sentences.en: A cord usually made of fiber, used for fastening, tying, or lacing.
sentences.cn: 通常由纤维构成的线, 用于加固, 绑或系.

sentences.en: Advanced Transformer fastening structure, the ability to short - circuit resistance.
sentences.cn: 变压器紧固结构先进, 抗短路能力强.

sentences.en: All the fastening pieces are made of stainless steel.
sentences.cn: 所有的紧固件均采用不锈钢制作.

sentences.en: Better fastening between sill and wall footing would be beneficial.
sentences.cn: 改善地基与墙基之间的连结是有益处的.

sentences.en: Cloud fastening under a white world and ice that part of memory.
sentences.cn: 云,拧下一片雪白的世界,冰封了那段记忆.

sentences.en: Exterior panel member fastening devices shall be corrosion resistant, non - metallic material.
sentences.cn: 外部连接装置都需抗化学腐蚀, 非金属材料 .

sentences.en: He's fastening on that poor girl like a leech.
sentences.cn: 他像蚂蟥一样缠着那个可怜的姑娘。

sentences.en: Master of many fastening parts, electrical terminal and air hoses.
sentences.cn: 熟悉各种紧固件 、 电气端子、气管路的使用及装配.

sentences.en: Seam by seam , fastening up the ragged edges of our relationship.
sentences.cn: 一线一线, 我们处于边缘的关系又被系牢.

sentences.en: Specializing in the production of high - strength bolts fastening nut.
sentences.cn: 专业生产高强度紧固件螺栓螺母.

sentences.en: Suitable for fastening all kinds of hook and placard.
sentences.cn: 适用于各种挂勾,海报看报的粘合固定.

sentences.en: The sundress has a neat back zipper fastening.
sentences.cn: 这件太阳裙背后有根灵巧的拉链。

sentences.en: The trousers have a fly fastening.
Tousled and barefoot, blinking sleepily, some " lazy sluts " troop downstairs fastening their clothes.
sentences.cn: 蓬头,赤脚, 一边扣着钮扣, 几个还没睡醒的 “ 懒虫 ” 从楼上冲下来了.

sentences.en: When fastening the apparatus, no extra stress should be added to it.
sentences.cn: 固定低压电器时不应使电器受额外应力.

phrases.tran_cn: 夹紧螺栓；紧固螺栓；紧固螺钉

trans.tran_cn: （使两物）系牢( fasten的现在分词 )，系紧，使牢固，（使）关紧
